title: Workshop for Enhancing Elementary Teachers' Competencies in Educational Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language education theory and digital tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Educational Technology Integration Instructional Design Competency Development Program for Elementary School Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more stages of the instructional design process for language classes utilizing educational technology tools.
Development of one microlearning content piece applying a collaborative project-based learning model.
Learners can collect and incorporate five or more peer feedback entries through a digital portfolio.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
